SELECT X.* FROM ( SELECT SUM(1) OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT, tb.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.MSG_SEQ DESC) AS RNUM, a.MSG_SEQ, fn_DetailCodeNm( a.MSG_GUBUN) as msg_gubuntxt, a.MSG_TITLE, a.MSG_CONTENT, a.MSG_REG_ID, FORMAT(a.MSG_REG_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') MSG_REG_DATE, MSG_UPDATE_ID, SUBSTRING( MSG_UPDATE_DATE, 1,10) MSG_UPDATE_DATE , USEYN FROM TB_MESSAGEINFO a WHERE 1=1
AND (a.MSG_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR a.MSG_GUBUN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
AND a.MSG_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND a.MSG_GUBUN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
)tb ) X WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage} ORDER BY X.MSG_SEQ desc
SELECT MSG_SEQ , MSG_TITLE FROM TB_MESSAGEINFO WHERE MSG_GUBUN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{msgGubun},'%')

SELECT a.MSG_SEQ, a.MSG_GUBUN, dbdo.FN_DETAILCODENM( a.MSG_GUBUN) as msgGubunTxt, a.MSG_TITLE, a.MSG_CONTENT, a.MSG_REG_ID, a.MSG_REG_DATE, MSG_UPDATE_ID, MSG_UPDATE_DATE, a.UseYn FROM TB_MESSAGEINFO a WHERE a.MSG_SEQ = #{msgSeq}
